name: STMT_PMT_PLAN_EST_ACCTS
description: This table extracts the related multiple response item SBP-20490.

columns.name: PRINT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the statement or detail bill record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: HSP_ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: Indicates the hospital accounts that are part of the pre-service estimate on the payment plan.
